dict.name:\"Plugins: Add a beta plugin for te: name:"Plugins: Add a beta plugin for testing (with or without version)"

dict.text:'The following is a list of beta pl: text:'The following is a list of beta plugins added via the command "Add a beta plugin for testing". You can chose to add the latest version or a frozen version. A frozen version is a specific release of a plugin based on its release tag.'
dict.text:\"Click the 'Edit' button next to a: text:"Click the 'Edit' button next to a plugin to change the installed version and the x button next to a plugin to remove it from the list."
dict.text:\"Removing from the list does not d: text:"Removing from the list does not delete the plugin, this should be done from the Community Plugins tab in Settings."

dict.setDesc('If enabled beta plugins will be: setDesc('If enabled beta plugins will be automatically enabled after installtion by default. Note: you can toggle this on and off for each plugin in the "Add Plugin" form.')
dict.setDesc(\"If enabled all beta plugins wi: setDesc("If enabled all beta plugins will be checked for updates each time Obsidian starts. Note: this does not update frozen version plugins.")

dict.setDesc(\"If enabled the latest version: setDesc("If enabled the latest version will be selected by default when adding a new plugin.")
dict.setDesc(\"If enabled, plugins with highe: setDesc("If enabled, plugins with higher app versions will be allowed to be installed. Also it allows desktop-only plugins to be installed on mobile devices.")
